text: In common usage, humankind generally refers to the group of all humans. Humankind may also refer to: * Cradle of Humankind, a paleoanthropological site in South Africa * Temples of Humankind, a series of underground temples in northern Italy * Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind, a 2014 non-fiction book by Yuval Noah Harari * Origins: The Journey of Humankind, a 2017 American documentary * "The Cradle of Humankind", a song by Flogging Molly from their 2011 album Speed of Darkness * Humankind (video game), a video game developed by Amplitude Studios * Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey, a video game developed by Panache Digital Games
title: Humankind (disambiguation)
